name: MIT Albert G. Hill Prize
description: The Albert G. Hill Prize is awarded to juniors or seniors from underrepresented minority backgrounds who have maintained high academic standards and have made continued contributions to improving diversity, equity, and inclusion at MIT.

name: Palantir Future Fellowship Scholar 2021
description: Palantir offers scholarships to support students from communities historically underrepresented in technology.

name: Richard Tapia Celebration of Diversity in Computing Conference Scholarship
description: I was sponsored to attend this conference. The goal of the Tapia Conferences is to bring together undergraduate and graduate students, faculty, researchers, and professionals in computing from all backgrounds and ethnicities.

name: Great Minds in STEM Scholar
description: Each year applications are received from hundreds of students from throughout the nation who compete to receive this prestigious award. The Scholar of the Week highlights the stories and successes of GMiS Scholarship recipients.

name: Google Hispanic Student Leadership Summit Scholar 2019
description: One of 50 invited to Googles first HSLS conference. I connected with leading minds across the US and listened to inspirational hispanic and latinx leaders at Google.

name: Virtual Reality Zone Award by Google
description: Best VR project developed on an HTC Vive VR. Win a Vive VR Kit by creating a unique VR project.
